attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Heading towards next waypoint (Only for fixed heading reference)

attributes.name: turningRadius
attributes.description: Turning radius of waypoint ( Maximum rate of turn = velocity/turning radius)

attributes.name: radiusOfAcceptance
attributes.description: Radius of acceptance ( Select next waypoint when within radius of acceptance )

attributes.name: lineOfSight
attributes.description: Line of sight length (Determines the line from the vessel to the intersection of the line between the current waypoint and the next)
